sources.title: Singing Cowgirl
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Singing Cowgirl (1938)
sources.description: Tolen is after the Harkins ranch where his men have found gold. After they kill Harkins, Dorothy and Dick step in and discover that the gold actually washes down from Tolen's own ranch. When Harkins' brother arrives to take over they test Tolen by having the brother offer to swap ranches. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-singing-cowgirl-1938/

sources.title: Singing Cowgirl (1938) DOROTHY PAGE
sources.description:
Stars: Dorothy Page, Dave O'Brien, Vince Barnett
 Director: Samuel Diege

 Tolen is after the Harkins ranch where his men have found gold. After they kill Harkins, Dorothy and Dick step in and discover that the gold actually washes down from Tolen's own ranch. When Harkins' brother arrives to take over they test Tolen by having the brother offer to swap ranches.

metadata.Plot: Tolen is after the Harkins ranch where his men have found gold. After they kill Harkins, Dorothy and Dick step in and discover that the gold actually washes down from Tolen's own ranch. When Harkins' brother arrives to take over they test Tolen by having the brother offer to swap ranches.
metadata.Actors: Dorothy Page, Dave O'Brien, Vince Barnett
